Item Trick
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Items: Item Trick
By manatee on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 06:08 pm:

Just a little 'trick' I have stumbled upon. If you are looking for a rare item like the OldPaint or Flyboots, save your game before opening the chest. If you don't like the item, reload and open the chest until you get what you want. I will add more useful info as I find it because I play this game a lot.

By cairy tiger on Sunday, March 31, 2002 - 02:52 pm:

i awalys save my game before i open a chest but it takes a long time to get the idem i want
